summary.title: About me
summary.description: I have been working with web development since 2012, the period during which I have worked in multiple Service based companies. I am a self-motivated and self-taught professional who likes to solve problems

career.title: Career Objective
career.description: To seek challenging assignment and responsibility, with an opportunity for growth and career advancement as successful achievements.

projects.name: Molina healthcare
description: I am working on Ractjs + Nodejs project from scratch. One project in angularjs + nodejs.
Working with USA client team and offshore team members daily on the priority work.
Automate and enhance applications as per business requirement.
Done migration from on premises to cloud and created CICD setup for Prod and lower environments.

projects.name: Adidas UK
description: Handled overall process - share SOW, cost estimation, development,testing(UAT and SIT), deployment, support and PO processing.
Nicely developed MVC dynamic video gallery.
Worked on SQL stored procedures, Developed SSIS packages and database performance tuning.
Automated Jira project creation using API.

projects.name: Genpact AMS
description: Worked on applications functionalities enhancement, deployment and support.
Developed MVC and ASP.net applications using technologies like User Controls, JavaScript and Linq.
Done performance tuning in SQL stored procedures.

projects.name: COSMOS GASDAY
description: It was an agile based development project in which we used to develop module on requirement bases within 2 weeks sprint.
I have worked on web application (MVC/ASP.net) framework and PL/SQL stored procedures.
I have done end to end unit testing,system testing and supported UK customer for UAT.

projects.name: SWS-WAMMI-IMPL
description: I provided solution to communicate between SAP UI and a .net application (extremely high level map) UI, to show particular jobs on specified work location (on exact location).
Used SAP API (Agentry Cyclo) and SigmaSeven GeoField mobile map app to communicate between them using Windows message loop concept.
Developed, tested and installed on Windows tablet.

projects.name: MSIT-ECIT-ENG-VLCM
description: I did migration of all the versions of the application from one server to another using VSTF 2012.
I have developed modules using MVVM model and WCF service.
Used SQL Profiler to check input/outputXML parameters values.
Created Unit Test Cases and tested using tool Microsoft Test Manager 2013

projects.name: IM WEB PORTAL & SUP
description: Done estimation, coding(C# and oracle), performance optimization, documentation, deployment and support.
Worked on Word templates with VBA synced them in SharePoint.
Developed stored procedures on Oracle Toad 10.5.

Sound knowledge of SQL and database management.

Possess good communication and team building skills.
Currently working for Healthcare Projects.
